xml.name: version
xml.version_command: echo $(R --version | grep version | grep -v GNU)", seurat version" $(R --vanilla --slave -e "library(seurat); cat(sessionInfo()\$otherPkgs\$seurat\$Version)" 2> /dev/null | grep -v -i "WARNING: ")

param.name: format
param.label: Choose the format of the input

param.name: anndata_file
param.label: AnnData file
param.help: The AnnData format provided by Scanpy

param.name: rds_seurat_file
param.label: RDS file
param.help: Input as RDS file with Seurat 3 object

param.name: rds_sce_file
param.label: RDS file
param.help: Input as RDS file with Single Cell Experiment object

macros.token: #if $input.format == "anndata" --input-object-file '$input.anndata_file' --input-format anndata #else if $input.format == "loom" --input-object-file '$input.loom_file' --input-format loom #else if $input.format == "rds_seurat" --input-object-file '$input.rds_seurat_file' --input-format seurat #else if $input.format == "rds_sce" --input-object-file '$input.rds_sce_file' --input-format singlecellexperiment #end if

param.name: genes_use
param.label: Genes to use
param.help: A file with gene names to use in construction of SNN graph if building directly based on expression data rather than a dimensionally reduced representation (i.e. PCs).

param.name: dims_use
param.label: PCA Dimensions to use
param.help: Number of PCs (dimensions) to use in construction of the SNN graph.
